General.Name: Capital Park S.A.
General.Description: Capital Park S.A. engages in the investment, development, and management of real estate properties in Poland. It operates through four segments: Investment Assets, Development Assets, Other Assets, and Assets held for Sale. The company is also involved in buying, selling, renting, and operating real estate properties. Its property portfolio includes office, retail, and other commercial properties, as well as hotels and apartments. The company manages a portfolio of properties with a total area of 213,000 square meters. Capital Park S.A. was founded in 2003 and is based in Warsaw, Poland. Capital Park S.A. is a subsidiary of Townsend Holding B.V.
